content: निस्यं(ष्यं)दः {@--1@} Flowing forth or down, trickling down, dropping, dripping, streaming, oozing; वल्कलशिखानिस्यंदरेखांकिताः <ls>Ś. 1. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A discharge, flux, sap, juice; <ls>U. 2. 21</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 6.</ls> {@--3@} A flow, stream, fluid that trickless down; हिमाद्रिनिस्यंद इवावतीर्णः <ls>R. 14. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 41</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 70</ls>; मदनिस्यंदरेखयोः <ls n="R.">10. 57</ls>; <ls>Me. 42.</ls> {@--4@} Necessary consequence or result. {@--5@} Uttering, declaring.
